d44def57-5f64-45c5-b004-9ce141ea0448.name: The Great Gatsby
d44def57-5f64-45c5-b004-9ce141ea0448.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
d44def57-5f64-45c5-b004-9ce141ea0448.description: Set in the Jazz Age, this classic novel explores themes of wealth, love, and the American Dream through the eyes of Jay Gatsby.

02df6084-1ef9-42fd-91df-083243c213a4.name: To Kill a Mockingbird
02df6084-1ef9-42fd-91df-083243c213a4.author: Harper Lee
02df6084-1ef9-42fd-91df-083243c213a4.description: Harper Lee's masterpiece addresses racial injustice in the American South during the 1930s through the eyes of young Scout Finch.

997a2257-1c72-4194-8543-ff40b2a4c269.author: George Orwell
997a2257-1c72-4194-8543-ff40b2a4c269.description: A dystopian novel that explores the consequences of a totalitarian regime, thought control, and the nature of truth.

657729f7-b03d-456a-9b72-ab16d9cfc689.name: The Hobbit
657729f7-b03d-456a-9b72-ab16d9cfc689.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
657729f7-b03d-456a-9b72-ab16d9cfc689.description: Journey with Bilbo Baggins as he sets out on an epic quest filled with dwarves, dragons, and magical adventures in Middle-earth.

5499bae8-6149-4893-aa2d-67e3a133eb20.name: The Girl on the Train
5499bae8-6149-4893-aa2d-67e3a133eb20.author: Paula Hawkins
5499bae8-6149-4893-aa2d-67e3a133eb20.description: A psychological thriller that follows the lives of three women and their connections to a mysterious disappearance.

9cdbe2ca-d19b-436b-a4d4-16b956e979bf.name: Pride and Prejudice
9cdbe2ca-d19b-436b-a4d4-16b956e979bf.author: Jane Austen
9cdbe2ca-d19b-436b-a4d4-16b956e979bf.description: A classic romance novel that explores societal expectations and the complexities of love in 19th-century England.

f5223eef-c7eb-4430-a3cb-e2ad60ff8f21.name: The Catcher in the Rye
f5223eef-c7eb-4430-a3cb-e2ad60ff8f21.author: J.D. Salinger
f5223eef-c7eb-4430-a3cb-e2ad60ff8f21.description: Follow the journey of Holden Caulfield as he navigates the challenges of adolescence and searches for authenticity in a phony world.

24a9d5e5-dbdd-450a-9ca5-fb52dba5f835.name: The Chronicles of Narnia
24a9d5e5-dbdd-450a-9ca5-fb52dba5f835.author: C.S. Lewis
24a9d5e5-dbdd-450a-9ca5-fb52dba5f835.description: Embark on a magical adventure with the Pevensie siblings in the enchanting land of Narnia, filled with talking animals and mythical creatures.

2ec1d346-7005-4d65-a686-5ad08cd1a76c.name: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
2ec1d346-7005-4d65-a686-5ad08cd1a76c.author: Douglas Adams
2ec1d346-7005-4d65-a686-5ad08cd1a76c.description: Join Arthur Dent as he navigates space with his alien friend Ford Prefect and encounters eccentric characters in this comedic sci-fi series.

cd0bc0b3-2f9d-46db-abd4-aec5384d8577.name: The Da Vinci Code
cd0bc0b3-2f9d-46db-abd4-aec5384d8577.author: Dan Brown
cd0bc0b3-2f9d-46db-abd4-aec5384d8577.description: A gripping thriller that follows symbologist Robert Langdon as he unravels ancient mysteries and uncovers hidden secrets.
